content: Messages are now coming in. The glitch was apparently due to the upgrade to Thunderbird 15 happened at the exact same time as Outlook/Microsoft decided to make me sign in again. Maybe it is going to be okay. I hope so!!!!!

Tutto quanto indicato dal link -> https://forum.mozillaitalia.org/index.php?topic=76956.0 è rispettato.

Allego una schermata che mostra come è configurato l'account

content: Sei già passato al metodo di autenticazione Oauth2 richiesto da Google? -> https://forum.mozillaitalia.org/index.php?topic=76522.msg530268#msg530268 -> https://forum.mozillaitalia.org/index.php?topic=76956.0
creator: @next

content:
Klasörü onarmayı deneyebilirsiniz. Gelen klasörüne sağ tıklayıp Özellikler'i seçin. Açılan pencereden Dizini onar'a tıklayın.

Ancak bunu yapmadan önce her ihtimale karşı C:\Users\kullanıcı adınız\AppData\Local\Thunderbird klasörünü yedeklemenizi öneririm.
creator: maxcoder

content:
È in sviluppo una versione di ImportExportTools che supporterà anche Thunderbird 115; al momento è però ancora in beta -> https://github.com/thundernest/import-export-tools-ng/issues/408

Se devi solo aprire un file mbox puoi provare MiTec Mail Viewer -> http://www.mitec.cz/mailview.html

content: Thanks. I did try that (twice) with no success.
creator: bma.query

content: Just delete the smart mailboxes subfolder of Mail, not Mail/Local Folders.
creator: sfhowes

content: Thanks. I tried this twice - the second time having set the view to All Folders only first - but no success. Maybe because I'm using Local Folders, I should have deleted Mail/Local Folders? Except that seems to have some content - oddly, only for one of the five mail accounts, but that's the only one with sub-subfolders (Account/Level 1/Level 2), so maybe that's why.
creator: bma.query

content:
You can try the standard steps to repair Unified View: Help/Troubleshooting Info, Profile Folder, Open Folder, close TB, delete virtualFolders.dat and the Mail/smart mailboxes subfolder. Restart TB and select Unified Folders view.

http://kb.mozillazine.org/Unified_Folders_not_working
creator: sfhowes

content: That sounded promising, but in fact All Folders wasn't checked. I tried several rounds of checking/rechecking/restarting in the hopes it would all reset, but that didn't work. I should be clear (see image) that this is not a separate window in the folders pane (like All Folders), but duplication within the Unified Folders view.
creator: bma.query

content: When you select View/Folders/Unified Folders, All Folders is already checked, so select View/Folders again and uncheck All Folders.
creator: sfhowes

content: Hi, thank you for your reply.. I have searched high and low and do not have any option that shows "format" in my print menu. A bit odd, can anyone else help me please?
creator: dph2107

content: It's possible to print a selected portion of a message. In the Print dialog, show More settings and click Selection under Format (see picture).
creator: sfhowes
